DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate influence virtual reality vibrational therapy reduce pain intensity secondary breast cancer application treatment protocol , biomedical instrumentation .
DOC.brief_title: Applicability Video Games Vibrational Therapy Reducing Pain Secondary Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: After physiotherapy assessment individual randomly divide three group : Group Virtual Reality - Cinesioterapia ( G1 ) , Group Vibration Therapy - Cinesioterapia ( G2 ) Control Group ( G3 ) , submit respective treatment protocol . Group Virtual Reality Cinesioterapia ( G1 ) participate group 20 woman treat game Xbox 360 ® , attribute , customize application use virtual augment reality develop . Vibration Therapy Group - Cinesioterapia ( G2 ) - participate group 20 woman undergo 15 minute continuous vibration blanket vibrate member higher , frequency 40 Hz , 3 function intensity tolerable , keep limb support elevate 120 º . At end hold muscle stretching exercise , dissociation shoulder girdle upper limb exercise asset . Control group ( G3 ) - participate group 20 woman treat conventional cinesioterapia muscle stretch exercise flexor , extensor , adductor abductor shoulder 20 second ; dissociation girdle ; financial asset Active assist group flexor , extensor , abductor adductor upper limb , perform three set 10 repetition exercise . Implementation treatment protocol group G1 , G2 G3 run two week , Monday Friday feira.totalizando 10 consecutive treatment session last 30 minute session . You prompt patient group G1 , G2 G3 respond individually without aid visual numeric scale pain , 10 minute pre-therapy , 15 minute start 10 minute end therapy . Patients undergo assessment pain , electromyographic activity muscle , muscle strength , range motion analysis perimetry first day treatment , complete session patient reassess .
DOC.criteria: Women underwent surgery unilateral mastectomy axillary lymphadenectomy modify period exceed one year ; Submit medical referral ; Which perform radiotherapy chemotherapy ; Age 4070 year ; Reporting pain , intermittent , prolonged duration intensity limit ADL ; Lymphedema ipsilateral upper limb surgery ; To agree sign Statement Consent Individuals fail provide medical referral ; Be carrier type cancer ; Have undergone type surgery removal breast cancer ; chemotherapy radiotherapy ; Do complain pain symptom lymphedema ; Presenting severe joint lock .
